biotools.summary: Provides a complete mQTL analysis pipeline for 1H NMR data. Distinctive features include normalisation using most-used approaches, peak alignment using RSPA approach, dimensionality reduction using SRV and binning approaches, and mQTL analysis for animal and human cohorts.

bioschemas.name: mQTL.NMR
bioschemas.summary: Provides a complete mQTL analysis pipeline for 1H NMR data. Distinctive features include normalisation using most-used approaches, peak alignment using RSPA approach, dimensionality reduction using SRV and binning approaches, and mQTL analysis for animal and human cohorts.
